entry.title: Segwit2Mb - combined soft/hard fork - Request For Comments
entry.summary: Sergio Demian Lerner is discussing the current proposal for SegWit, which comes with a 2MB block size increase. Praxeology asks if Lerner is proposing to remove this bundled policy change and implement a different BIP that increases the block size. Praxeology is unclear if Lerner understands the current proposal.
